message.body: Everything looks good tomorrow. I checked you in and forwarded your boarding pass. You can always use the machines at the airport, but it will save you time i
f you're not checking bags. You'll notice no seat assignment so see the gate agent. Have fun!
All is well, I had a seat to Dallas when I checked in :)
First class seat on the way to San Antonio. :) Best uncle ever!
Safe and sound in San Anton :)
I"ll let you know if pax load changes. Plan on a call Monday. Have fun
